results.title: Treatment of white coat hypertension with metformin.

citations.NLM: Helvaci MR, Sevinc A, Camci C, Yalcin A. Treatment of white coat hypertension with metformin. Int Heart J. 2008 Nov;49(6):671-9. PMID: 19075483

results.title: Metformin and parameters of physical health.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Due to the very high prevalences of @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@excess weight@@@ and probably many associated disorders with the @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@excess weight@@@, including @DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@IGT@@@ or @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@, @<m>DISEASE_White_Coat_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059466 @@@WCH@@@ or @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@HT@@@, and @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@, above the age of 50 years, and the detected significant benefits of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on all of the above parameters, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment should be initiated in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@excess weight@@@ in their fifties.

citations.NLM: Helvaci MR, Kaya H, Borazan A, Ozer C, Seyhanli M, Yalcin A. Metformin and parameters of physical health. Intern Med. 2008;47(8):697-703. PMID: 18421184
